website_summaries.verdict: This product can be used on a warm stove and does a good job of getting up hard to removed cooked on foods.
pros: Scrub pads come with the cleaner
Works on both ceramic and glass stoves
Does a good job on baked on grease
Can use on stove while it is still warm
cons: This product will require some persistence for tough stains

customer_reviews.title: Cooktop Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I thought i ruined my new stove with stains after using it a coupled of times so i decided to try this because the stove just looked terrible even when clean. Wasn't too sure if it was going to remove the stains but it totally did, now my stove looks brand new and beautiful. I was too excited to try the product so i forgot to take a pic of how terrible my stove looked but heres and after pic.
customer_reviews.author: MyView01

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker.
customer_reviews.text: Miracle worker. My electric oven top was gross and I used this (I cleaned it with water after and buffed it with a dish towel) and it came out perfect. So impressed I didn't think it would work. My nephew says it looks better than it did when it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Really like this!
customer_reviews.text: We had roommates move in who scratched our stove and would never clean it. I didn't want to use the green scrubbies available in the store, for fear they would be too rough on our glass top stove. My mom recommended this product and I went on Amazon to order it. I love that it comes with the yellow scrubbies and they're not too abrasive, they're just right. This did a good job in buffing the stove to where the scratches aren't as visible. It did require some elbow grease but that's not a big deal for me. I will be purchasing this again when it runs out. Better than the ones I've purchased at the store!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SMELL!!
customer_reviews.text: THE SMELL OF THIS IS HEAVENLY! Oh and it cleans my stove top very well too. Its an awesome product and doesn't give off that strong chemically smell like most of the good stove top cleaners do. It almost has a cinnamon smell. I definitely will repurchase this product when I run out. I use so little of the product to get my stove top clean that I'm not sure when I will need to replenish it. 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed actually. We had a pan spill over as it was cooking and it burned onto the glass flat top burner (so we thought)....ordered this, which came on time by the way, and it removed every bit of it. Left it shiny too. No nasty smell. I'm pleasantly surprised. We had tried other things that wouldn't remove it at all, we thought it was going to have to stay this way. This stuff is amazing and highly recommend. Looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at removing most stains
customer_reviews.text: This product is strong enough to remove those tough grease stains on your electric stove. I think the product is a little too strong as it has started to wear down my stovetop and cause a slight discoloration. Overall, it works as described and gets a majority of the grease stains out on my stove. I would consider buying it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Monnie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely nothing works as well
customer_reviews.text: I had tried Mr. Clean pads, Bar Keeper's Friend, everything including pouring boiling water onto the burned on (more like volcano residue!) surface, and nothing even made a dent. This product was the first thing that not only worked, but worked relatively easily, and with no smell at all. I will never be without this again!
customer_reviews.author: SUZICOOKS

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I bought this not expecting much. The cleaner i was using could not get some stubborn buildup off. I tried grease remover, steam, another cleaner, etc, short of a metal scrapper. I wanted it clean with out compromising the cook top. I just used the Trinova Cooktop Cleaner as directed. The cook top looks brand new. The stubborn spots easily scrubbed out with the included pad. I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alco

customer_reviews.title: Better than Cerama Bryte
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and I literally opened up the package and immediately went to my stove. This worked better than Cerma Bryte, which I had used before (with razor blades to scrape the top). Perhaps this is better due to the handy sponges. I used more than the recommended quarters worth, scrubbed away the dark bits and got the stove looking pretty darned sparkly. If I was REALLY picky and the stove was in the center of the kitchen I might worry about baby scratches from the sponge, but no worries here.... within 15 minutes I was happy with my glass top and on to the next project.
customer_reviews.author: George d.

customer_reviews.title: Burning water...
customer_reviews.text: I had a roommate that was very good and burning water on a daily basis on our glass top at home... she was also very bad and cleaning up after herself and burning everything else she cooked. Somehow most of it never stayed in the pot or pan.... well after trying a few different cleaners that hardly worked, this stuff is amazing! I didn’t think there was any hope in cleaning the glass top. Now it looks almost new. This cleaner is a must have for glass top owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I had several spots that were pretty well cooked into the surface of the range top (or so I thought). I had used two other cleaners in the past (after scraping with razor) but the spots were still visible. One cleaning with this and they were gone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aeroscout

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it,specially if you have a glass counter top
customer_reviews.text: Love love this product. I have been able to keep my glass counter top looking new. Even after some Major messes trying to cook. I just wait for my counter top to cool down and pour some of this magic liquid with some help from the blade and voila top looking new again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaner I've used
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It has a nice smell, it's easy to use and it really cleans well with no residue. Other cleaners I have tried leave a film that is hard to remove this cleans and polishes my cook top easily.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedra K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because you do not have to rub very hard to get the stove top clean. I cook everyday and my stove still looks brand new. I only clean and the end of the day and it all come s off. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other products I've tried, but didn't take all the stains off.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works better than other products I have tried for my white porcelain gas cook top, but there are still some stains. Takes quite a bit of scrubbing and I left it to set all day to try to make it easier. Maybe after a few uses it will take the rest of ghe stains off. My stove definitely looks better than it did so I think it's worth the money. There may be something better out there, though.
customer_reviews.author: Allesandra

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Off Burnt On Black Spots
customer_reviews.text: This cooktop cleaner & scrubber combo cleaned burnt on black spots. Other cleaners would not. I had to vigorously scrub with the included non scratch scrubber but it worked! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cherryroses

customer_reviews.title: Make your glass cooktop look like new
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works perfectly on my glass top electric cooktop. I did not use the enclosed scrubbing pads as other reviewers warned they can scratch the surface. I applied the cleaner, let it sit for a minute, and just used a little pressure in polishing the surface. The cooktop looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Wogan

customer_reviews.title: Took off melted dish towel!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son accidentally put a polyester dish owl on the hot burner and melted it to the burner! We only hand hour glass top stove for a week so we were furious. 1st we had to use a scraper designed for glass top stoves and it took most of it off but it was left with a bunch of residue from the melted towel. This stuff is absolutely amazing and took it right off! You will not regret buying this cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: david amos

customer_reviews.title: First time to use this stove top cleaner
customer_reviews.text: First time to use this stove top cleaner, it worked excellent ,after it cleaned the top , I buffed the top to a beautiful shine. No streaks or white powder on the stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: TriNova cook top cleaner and scrubby
customer_reviews.text: We like this product and have used it before. The seller got it to us very quickly and it was nicely wrapped in plastic wrap to avoid leaking. Works very well on flat cook tops.
customer_reviews.author: Dance4Joy

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what I wanted. Being from a place where we use many ingredients for cooking including different types of oil and spices, we were looking for something exactly this product. Its worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Natraj

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but works excellently
customer_reviews.text: At just over $10 I thought this was a little pricey but other than that an excellent product. I'm very sensitive to chemical smells and this doesn't bother me at all thought it does have a definite scent. It works very well on the glass stove top!
customer_reviews.author: Organics Geek

customer_reviews.title: This stuff made all the difference with our flat top stove.
customer_reviews.text: I'm forever boiling something over while I'm doing something else. Once it cooks on there, it's not easy to get off, but this stuff worked really well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, miracle product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle, I bought a brand new stove a couple days ago, after cooking for a few times some spots wouldn't come out I even thought it was a problem with the glass , so after reading some reviews I decided to give a try and buy this stuff, I am going to be honest thinking that the problem was the glass a try to cancel this order , it was too late for that, by the way thanks Amazon for the fastest delivery got this in 24 hours ,I don't regret it at all, totally recommend. This is a miracle, product very satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Roberto C.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times now I like it so far marks are gone I haven’t used it on any major burn marks will update when I do
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to clean our electric stove top. It did a remarkable job! It ended up shiny and like new again. I did have to use it 2-3 times for the baked grease to come off, but it eventually did. There was very little scrubbing and was extremely easy to use. Shake, pour and scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L. Faust

customer_reviews.title: this really made my cooktop shine
customer_reviews.text: I especially liked the fact that you only have to use a quarter size amount. And that really does do the job. I'm accustomed to pouring cleaner all over the range top but this amount worked just great to clean the whole surface.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove stains, just left stove top shiny
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions and hoped for the best. Unfortunately, it did not remove the stains. After I scrubbed the stovetop down, I buffed it with a dry paper towel. This left the stovetop shiny, but not stain free. I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Wilder

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't remove the burns...
customer_reviews.text: I keep looking for a good cooktop cleaner and this one so far is the best one. However, it doesn't reamove the burns...it just cleans well. I tried to be patient and scrub it a lot, but the burns don't go away. In comparison with other ones I got from Tjmaxx this one works the most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fast and Efficient to use. Handy cleaner that can be used daily. This is my second bottle – can’t do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the first and only products to begin breaking down the burnt grease on my range. Recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: PSL10

customer_reviews.title: This product lives up to expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I recommend it, because it’s economical and does not scratch my glass top stove. The scrubbers are large enough for me to use without cramping my hand, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Emanuelson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with ease.
customer_reviews.text: I was given a product very similar to this when buying my stove. When I ran out everything I found in the stores was running and didn’t do the job. This has the consistency that works great with little to no elbow grease. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost new stovetop
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Makes my stovetop look brand new, no scratches. Couldn’t be happier with it, so much so that I bought some for our rental house too, and the renters think it works great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fessler

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I haven’t had great luck with some other products but this was easy and fast. I use it with a soft sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...you must have this and wipe up spills right away. I don't care for glass top cooktops, but had to get for our rental unit. I put it put it out for the renters to use, so hopefully they will. If used right away, it will do a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my stove sooo shiny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Love it! This is my first cooktop electric stove and I love this product. Leaves my stove sooo shiny. I am going to buy one for my sister in law so she doesn't have to scrub so hard on her flat cooktop stove.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Belmontes

customer_reviews.title: As good as it says!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because no cleaning product has worked as well is it says, but thus stuff worked like a charm. I’m sure it’s the combo of the cleaner plus the scrub sponge it comes with but they cleaned up my stovetop perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: TriNova Cooktop Cleaner....it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had some stubborn cooking stains left on my kitchen cooktop which other products have not been able to remove. TriNova removed the majority of these stains with minimal effort. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: G. Mogavero

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good and I like the scrubber it came with. It helps with hard to remove cooked on gunk
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Was issued a prompt refund.
customer_reviews.author: Buckf

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something worked
customer_reviews.text: We tried a few store bought products to clean the electric range in our kitchen when we moved in, and nothing worked. This stuff makes the residue come up without hard scrubbing, doesn't smell too bad, and came shipped in good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I thought what was scratches turned out to be baked on food. We just bought the stove and it took the baked on food off. We did have to do a couple of applications because it was really on there. The stove top looks beautiful with no streaks. I love that it is made in the USA! Thank you Trinova I will be a lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Best glass top cleaner ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the cleaner to use on burnt on glassy top burners. It took a little scrubbing but the cleaner worked great
customer_reviews.author: david Coen

customer_reviews.title: It works and it's easy!
customer_reviews.text: My first electric stove and I had no idea how to clean the mess I made. I ordered this and have been using it for months now. It really works. Very little effort required. The included pad is amazing. So glad I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ross

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use it quite often and it keeps the glass top stove looking great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff I've ever used! Before the cremabright was good but not this fast or good. I only spend 5 mins
customer_reviews.author: The Kim's

customer_reviews.title: First time electric stove user....
customer_reviews.text: Product was recommended by a friend...Works great! We are first time electric stove owners...always had gas and had no idea how to clean the top. We thought we had permanently stained or scratched it. No so! One application and the top was much better. A few applications and it looked close to new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my stove looking new
customer_reviews.text: My stove IS new and I plan on keeping it looking that way! This is very easy to use and works well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Do not use on stainless steel surface, pads will leave scratch marks on surface.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff..
customer_reviews.text: This product makes cleaning my ceramic stove top a snap. It is really effortless, just put a little on and then wipe it off...just that simple.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Kee

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Good thing about it is that you don't have to clean the grease as much where this product will make the cook top nice and shiny once you buff it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ary A.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but takes a lot of time and work
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cleans the stovetop, but it does take a lot of work to get it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: my wife has used this product now for 6 months. glass stove top still looks new
customer_reviews.author: Rick Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Really no better than the others. Still didn't get my burned on water off.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Glo

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I made sure to read the reviews but I guess everyone’s results are different. I posted the picture because this is 4th time and this is how it looks. Coment does the work for .79. Very disappointed. Look at the pictures you be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and made our stove top look brand new. Other reviews noted the need for "elbow grease", which is to be expected given the fact the build-up and deposits have been burned on to the cooktop. I was very pleased with this product, and would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Really cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Love it as it leaves my glass stove top squeaky clean 🤩

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have found for removing stubborn stains off of my glass cook top! Back to spotless with minimal work

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Stove top looks brand new. Didn’t know there was a product for this.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: New stove is staying clean and scratch free thanks to this cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: You literally only need to use a quarter sized amount of this to clean your whole stove top! This bottle will last so long and the baked on card that you can never seem to get off the glass comes right off...makes the stove top look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: KatyRose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this amazing product...still requires some elbow muscle but worth every penny I paid!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I used to scatched my stove top up from trying to get the stains out but this stuff got it off with no problem. You do have to put in some elbow grease but the results are worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable, I didn’t think my stove top could ever look new again. But it does after just one use.

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: of all the glass range top cleaners we hav tried, this is the best!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it’s thick. I have to squirt it out of the bottle and then smear it over the messy areas. Not crazy about the smell but that’s a personal issue

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my new stove top would be easy to take care of but it wasn't until I tried this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I used this and had remarkable results. I have tried all the "brand" stovetop cleaners and this tops them all! It goes on easily, using very little product and shines to a mirror finish. The protective finish makes clean up a breeze. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: lab

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaner I’ve ever purchased for my cooktop stove
customer_reviews.text: This was the best cleaner I’ve purchased for my cooktop stove it goes on smooth and completely wipes so easy. This product restores my finish like brand new.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic! Stove looks good as new. I was worried the stains wouldn’t come off but after scrubbing for about 5 minutes it completely removed all stains! The brushes are perfect too and not too harsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works better than other products I've tried to clean my glass top stove.

customer_reviews.title: Effortless cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, cleaned my glass stove top effortlessly, and it doesn't have an annoying long lasting smell like similar stove top cleaners on the market.

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do ya!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a bottle and it lasted me almost seven years. It doesn't take much and cleans very well. I ordered my second bottle last week.

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: Short and to the point... My glass cooktop had a large area with burned-on plastic. This product removed all of the plastic and left the cooktop looking like it was brand new. Some moderate elbow grease is necessary, but very a very rewarding outcome await!

customer_reviews.title: Stove has never looked better since brand new.....
customer_reviews.text: This product is hands-down better than anything on the market. The difference before and after could be compared to taking your car for a high dollar wash, wax and buff. Stove looked nearly new after one good application. Amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: Product worked well on stove top. Unfortunately I had to improvise with a Mr. Eraser because I did not receive the pads included with the kit. Next time I will try just the Mr. Eraser!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Very effective.

customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! Small amount goes a long way.... Will buy again...

customer_reviews.text: I am particular in regards to how the top of our stove looks! TriNova satisfied me completely! Thank you. I just purchased my second bottle. That says a lot about my satisfaction with your product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TriNova Premium Cooktop Cleaner and Scrubbing Pads. Best Cleaning Kit for Smooth Top Ranges & Stoves of Glass, Ceramic. Non-Abrasive and Scratch Free scouring sponges with Cream Formula 12oz.
product_meta.description:
Don’t keep dinner leftovers on your cooktop, wipe it down and enjoy an Ageless Appliance!

TriNova’s Cooktop Cleaner is a non-abrasive formula: 
- Won’t scratch or streak 
- Works on all types of cooktops and stove tops, whether they are ceramic or glass. 
- Keeps your cooktop looking new and shiny! 

With TriNova, rest assured you will receive the best customer care and highest-quality Leather Cleaner around. 
- 12 oz bottle for best value 
- Complimentary scrubbing pads 
- 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

Keep your kitchen appliances looking their best! 
Cooktops and Stainless Steel can sometimes be difficult to clean. But, we are here to help! Right now, you can save 20% off our Cooktop Cleaner when you purchase it with our Stainless Steel Cleaner. Just use the code 4KTCHN20 at check out. Just scroll up to view our promotion details.
feature_bullets: ☑️ NON-ABRASIVE - Clean your stove after you cook, whether it's a range, whirlpool, or stovetop. Heavy duty polish will make the surface shine right out of the bottle.
☑️ PAD INCLUDED - Special bundle to make cleanup after cooking easy. Scrub any non gas oven top daily to care for your appliances and avoid buying a replacement.
☑️ EASY APPLICATION - Just apply this cleanser to appliance new or old and watch as the non abrasive remover transforms your accessories. Eliminate residue today, an exceptional value.
